Text:
Why can't I download this torrent?
Is it a PB quirk or is the torrent at fault?

same think here.

I'm getting a 'broken link' answer everytime.

Does anyone know the reason?
Are you guys still having problems with this one? I'm showing it uploading at 100K with 12 seeders and 16 leachers, it should be fine.

yes, the problem is still the same, and appears only for this torrent.

I havo no idea why.
Everything is fine on my end, so I can't figure out  what's causing the problem. I'll check in the forum  to see if anyone knows what can cause the broken link error.

Okay, according to a very helpful mod in the forum, it's an issue with the server that the torrent is stored on. 

Workaround: Use the magnet link, that IS working. The mod mentioned current versions of Vuze (Azureus), uTorrent, and Transmission, as working with Magnet Links.

The workaround works. 

Thank you for taking the time of finding out and explaining.

You're very welcome. I take my porn very seriously. :) 

Happy Wanking !!
